advertisingPage.title: Advertising Placement
advertisingPage.subtitle: Reach thousands of potential buyers and sellers on Georgia's most popular real estate platform

intro.title: Advertising Spaces
intro.description: Place your advertisement on our platform and get maximum visibility. We offer various advertising spaces at different prices.

legalRestrictions.title: Legal Restrictions
legalRestrictions.description: In accordance with the restrictions provided by the Georgian Law on Advertising, the following will not be placed on the platform:
restrictions: Tobacco products, tobacco accessories and/or devices intended for tobacco consumption
Gambling, totalizator, lottery, bingo, and their organizers
Pharmaceutical products subject to special control (first group), second group, and those without permission to be placed on the Georgian market
Any type of advertising for artificial infant feeding products (except supplementary food), feeding bottles and pacifiers
legalRestrictions.contactInfo: Contact us to place an advertisement or for additional information.

placements.title: Advertising Placements and Prices
placements.subtitle: Choose the most suitable advertising placement for your business

homeTopBanner.name: Home Page Top Banner
homeTopBanner.description: The most visible position on the site, seen by all visitors

homeBottomBanner.name: Home Page Bottom Banner
homeBottomBanner.description: Perfect spot for deeply engaged users

listingsTopBanner.name: Listings Page Top Banner
listingsTopBanner.description: High conversion zone during active search

listingsMiddleBanner.name: Listings Page Middle Banner
listingsMiddleBanner.location: Listings page - between property grid (after first 8 properties)
listingsMiddleBanner.description: Targeted audience with specific search interests

listingsBottomBanner.name: Listings Page Bottom Banner
listingsBottomBanner.description: Captures attention of users who scrolled through all listings

detailTopBanner.name: Property Detail Top Banner
detailTopBanner.description: High intent users viewing specific property details

detailMiddleBanner.name: Property Detail Middle Banner
detailMiddleBanner.location: Property Detail page - below property info card
detailMiddleBanner.description: Engaged users reading full property information

detailSidebar.name: Property Detail Sidebar
detailSidebar.location: Property Detail page - below agent info card
detailSidebar.description: Highly visible position for users interested in contacting

contactForm.title: Advertising Placement Request
contactForm.subtitle: Fill out the form and we will contact you for advertising package details
contactForm.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Please specify your advertising goals, budget and other important details...
contactForm.messageDescription: We will contact you within 24 hours regarding advertising matters

specialOffer.title: Special Offer
specialOffer.firstMonth: First month is free for new clients.
